formulas.name: careServiceOrigin
formulas.expression: IF({!sObject} = "Task", "CSC Call", IF({!sObject} = "LiveChatTranscript", "CSC Chat", IF({!sObject} = "MessagingSession","CSC Messaging", IF({!sObject} = "Case", "CSC Email", ""))))

formulas.description: Case Record type ID from Operation Exception
formulas.name: CaseOperationExceptionRT

formulas.description: Find the correct record type for the Request according to the origin of the case
formulas.name: FormulaRequestRT

formulas.description: ID of the User who launch the flow
formulas.name: FormulaRunningUser

formulas.description: New status except for POD with Sku -> "Follow-up"
formulas.name: FormulaStatus
FormulaSubject
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISNULL({!POD_with_Sku})), "Product on Demand - "+{!VarProductSkuName}, IF( NOT(ISNULL({!POD_without_Sku})), "Product on Demand without sku - "+{!VarUnknownProduct}, IF( NOT(ISNULL({!CaseCallRT})), "ObjTaskCall.Subject", {!ObjCase.Subject})))

formulas.description: Record Type of Waiting list from Case
formulas.name: PODwithoutSkuRT

formulas.description: Record Type of POD with SKU
formulas.name: PODwithSkuRT

formulas.description: For the Qualification record, the ParentRelatedTo__c field should be set to empty only from a New request (Case list view or Account detail page)
formulas.name: recordIdToReplaceForQualification

recordCreates.description: Creation of case with record type Operation Exception with order shipping lookup
recordCreates.name: Operation_Exception_Creation_With_Order_Shipping
recordCreates.label: Operation Exception Creation With Order Shipping

recordCreates.description: Creation of case with record type Operation Exception without Order shipping lookup
recordCreates.name: Operation_Exception_Creation_Without_Order_Shipping
recordCreates.label: Operation Exception Creation Without Order Shipping

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ErrorText
fields.fieldText: Sorry, but you can’t read or update records at this time. {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

variables.description: Depending on where the Request Creation is requested (from a new call/case/chat... OR 'New Request' button)
variables.name: isNewQualification

variables.description: Is new case creation from scratch (no link to a parent record)
variables.name: isNoRecordId

variables.description: User selection for the Request Type screen
variables.name: varRequestTypeSelection

variables.description: Temporary - quick fix - to be deleted for next version
variables.name: VarStoreVerification
